DeathSteel::
He leaned against the back wall of the room and crossed his arms 
infront of his chest.  He nodded at KitKat's question as to when do 
they do battle. He too wanted to fight. But not if he wasn't sure of 
victory. One fights when one has the advantage. So far, unless the 
maximals were a smaller number than they were, he didn't see an 
obvious advantage over his nemesis.  He waited for Hydras to make the 
final decision.
